sitename: Virginia Department of Health, Division of Immunization
cleaned_text: As parents we want our children to grow up healthy and strong. One of the simplest ways of doing so is by ensuring that your child receives all of his/her immunizations and in a timely fashion. By doing so, you can protect your child from many vaccine preventable diseases such as measles and pertussis (whooping cough). What is the Virginia Immunization Information System (VIIS)? The Virginia Immunization Information System (VIIS) is the statewide registry system. The registry system is a confidential, computerized immunization information system which has records of the vaccinations which were given to your child. Through VIIS your medical provider can insure your child receives the right immunizations at the right time.
